verses.name: Acts 4:27
verses.text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus, whom thou hast anointed, both Herod, and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles, and the people of Israel, were gathered together,

verses.name: Acts 4:28
verses.text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done.

verses.name: Acts 4:29
verses.text: And now, Lord, behold their threatenings: and grant unto thy servants, that with all boldness they may speak thy word,

verses.name: Acts 4:30
verses.text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus.
